api package¶

Submodules¶

api.restapi module¶

api.restapi.attribute_value(geonameid, attribute=None)¶

Return attribute value of a city given a geonameid and attribute name. If no attribute name is given, a specified city profile is returned based on the geonameid.

api.restapi.city_dict(cityobj)¶

Turn City type object into a dict struture.

api.restapi.distance(cityid1, cityid2)¶

Return the distance between 2 cities in miles.

api.restapi.proximity(cityid, k, country_code=None)¶

Query for the ‘k’ closest cities to cityid where closeness is measured by distance of its latitude and longitude.

api.restapi.query(regex)¶
api.restapi.version()¶

Main page, greeting..
